title: New: Malena Zavala – A Vision That’s Changed
content:
Aliso, the debut album from Malena Zavala is shaping up to be rather special.

With last years singles Should I Try and If It Goes demonstrating her phenomenal songwriting talent, most recent release, A Vision That’s Changed again showcases her unique writing prowess. Poignant and wistful, this feels like a love song at its core, yet tinged with an almost psych-pop edge; it’s as moving as anything else I’ve heard this year. Check it out below. Aliso is released 13 April through Yucatan Records.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
